ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Gloria J. Epstein ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. GLORIA J. EPSTEIN, a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for Ontario, effective September 18, 2018.
